Name: Run Sheldon
About the game: 'Run Sheldon' is a 3D running game. The character controlled by the player will avoid various obstacles and run fast in the forest. The character controlled by the player needs to collect gems while running. The more gems collected, the higher the score. Players need to avoid obstacles by controlling the direction, and the game will fail once they encounter obstacles. 【Game Control】 Move left: A Move right :D Jump: W Sliding down: S 【Game Features】 Explosion-Proof Shield: Resists damage from all obstacles. Magnet: Can attract gems and buffs to your side. Although the game is simple to operate, it requires certain skills and reaction speed to get a high score. More challenges await you.
